text: Ba bandi bavuze bati “Mu by’ukuri, Allah yadusezeranyije kutazemera intumwa iyo ari yo yose keretse izatuzanira igitambo kizotswa n’umuriro (uvuye mu ijuru).” Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Intumwa zabagezeho mbere yanjye zifite ibimenyetso bigaragara ndetse (zinafite) n’ibyo muvuga; none se kuki mwazishe niba muri abanyakuri?”
